Federal.definition: of or constituting a form of government in which power is distributed between a central authority and a number of constituent territorial units

1.definition: of or constituting a form of government in which power is distributed between a central authority and a number of constituent territorial units (as states) [a government]

2.definition: of or relating to the central government of a federation as distinguished from the governments of the constituent territorial units (as states)of or relating to the laws made and enforced by the federal government [a crime]
